features: 12 oz tube of Aveeno Eczema Therapy Daily Moisturizing Body Cream from the #1 dermatologist-recommended eczema moisturizer brand. Enriched with colloidal oatmeal & ceramide, it is clinically-proven to relieve dry, itchy, irritated skin due to eczema

This breakthrough eczema cream has been awarded the National Eczema Association Seal of Approval & is clinically shown to help soothe skin & relieve the key symptoms of eczema, including itchiness, dryness, & irritation

Nourishing formula of this moisturizing eczema cream is enriched with colloidal oatmeal & Ceramide, essential lipids naturally found within skin, to enhance & strengthen skin's natural moisture barrier while helping to relieve minor skin irritations

From the #1 dermatologist-recommended eczema moisturizer brand, our eczema cream is designed to help soothe skin & prevent the recurrence of extra-dry skin. It is allergy tested, steroid- & fragrance-free & is gentle enough for daily use on the bod

Aveeno uses the goodness of nature & the power of science to keep your skin looking & feeling healthy & balanced. This eczema cream for adults helps strengthen skin's natural moisture barrier, helping prevent the cycle of dryness
body.description: Product Description Keeping your skin's moisture levels intact is important for management of eczema. Developed with leading dermatologists, this breakthrough skin protectant & daily eczema therapy cream is clinically shown to help relieve the key symptoms of eczema, including dry, itchy & irritated skin. Formulated with Colloidal Oatmeal & Ceramide, an essential lipid naturally found within skin, Aveeno Eczema Therapy Daily Moisturizing Body Cream helps to soothe & prevent the recurrence of extra-dry skin. Aveeno Eczema Therapy Daily Moisturizing Cream is allergy tested, steroid-free and fragrance-free and temporarily protects & helps relieve minor skin irritation and itching due to eczema & rashes, breaking the cycle of dryness. From the #1 dermatologist-recommended eczema moisturizer brand, Aveeno uses the goodness of nature & the power of science to keep your skin looking and feeling healthy & balanced. This daily eczema cream has been awarded the National Eczema Association Seal of Approval. Brand Story By Aveeno Manufacturer Contact Information Customer can contact our Consumer Care team directly at 1-800-361-8068 See more

reviews.reviewText: I have tried probably 30 different lotions for my itching feet. This is the first one that worked. First night I slept peacefully without itching keeping me awake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have been suffering with dyshidrotic eczema for years now. It started on my hands as a child, and now as a 27 year old it's moved to my feet. It's miserable! Super itchy, sweaty, blisters pop, feet dry out, then crack, then get sweaty and itchy again and the rotation begins again. I was hesitant to buy thus, seemed expensive to me, but after all the great reviews, and trying literally everything else, I bought it. This stuff is amazing! Buy it now! It's for sensitive skin, not scented, and drys nicely! It doesnt make you greasey or clog your pores! That was another issue. If I put any other lotion on, gold bond, equate, dove, anything sensitive, it was way too thick and made my feet/eczema flair up much much worse! This stuff is just great in general! You don't even need to have eczema to use it. Super moisturizing! RECOMMENDED!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Scent I love it
reviews.reviewText: Makes my skin soft I have bought 2 for me and one for my sister
I very much like this heavy duty moisturizer. It has helped my dry cracking fingers a lot. Will purchase again.
parece funcionar, pero debe usarse mínimo mañana y noche, después de lavarse las manos, llegó rápido.

reviews.reviewTitle: La mejor crema contra el eczema
reviews.reviewText: Soy súper alérgica y tengo una piel ultra sensible, esta es la mejor crema que he probado contra el eczema, punto. Se absorbe rápidamente y no se cae cuando te lavas. Además si tienes alguna irritación en la piel, te la cura rapidísimo. Solía encargarla a Estados Unidos y ahora que la venden aquí, aproveché para comprar stock.
I suffer from eczema and am not paid to write this review. This product really works for me. I have tried perhaps 20 products until I got to this one and I am grateful that I found it.
